item.title: Galkons 317 "Revo"
item.dc:creator: @SonGoku SonGoku
item.description:
@SonGoku wrote:

Well, first time he released, he only gave credits to Clienthax for the 317 deob. Then he got flamed, and he removed. On Lumbridge . org, he now gives credits to Webber for his client, and danno for the interfaces. Uhm, No.

Galkon used Dannos 481 client as a base, and i have proof.

  1. Sprite’s. The sprites are the exact same names as Dannos ( Caps and all ). Clicked.png, chover.png ect ect.

  2. Mod Icons. On dannos 481, only the admin crown has custom, not mod. Same with Galkons.

  3. Gameframe is loaded as one thing. He said he got the idea. Funny how the redstones are exactly the same as Dannos as well, hey Galkon.

  4. He didnt obfuscate previous versions, when i decompiled those, they had the same things as Dannos, done in the way danno does them ( Sprites.java was way diffrent on Dannos then i have ever seen );

  5. The current version, he did not obfuscate The signlink.java

  6. Why is the loading bar in the same place as Dannos galkon?


         public static final String findcachedir()
	  {
                  /*String S = System.getProperty("file.separator");
                  String os = System.getProperty("os.name");
                  String home = System.getProperty("user.home") + "/dodian.com/cache/";
                  home = home.replace('/', S.charAt(0));
                  String user = System.getProperty("user.name");
                  try
                  {
                      String s = ".file_store_32";
                    String[] s1 = {"c:/dodian.com/cache/", "./cache/", home};
                      s1[0] = home.replace('/', S.charAt(0));
                      for(int i = 0; i < s1.length; i++){
                              File file = new File(s1[i] + s);
                              if(file.exists() || file.mkdir())
                                  return s1[i] + s + S;
                      }
                  }
                  catch(Exception _ex) { }*/
           try
            {
            	String s = ".file_store_32";
                String s1 = "./cache/";
                File file = new File(s1 + s);
                if(file.exists() || file.mkdir())
                    return s1 + s + "/";
            }
            catch(Exception _ex) { }
       
              return null;
          }
    public static String getCacheDestination()
    {
        String s = System.getProperty("os.name");
        String s1 = System.getProperty("user.home") + "/";
        return s1 + "dodian.com/";
    }

Hmmmm, Looks like Dannos ( Not webbers, webbers doenst have most of that stuff ) To me.

ALL I FUCKING WANT IS FOR HIM TO STOP THINKING HES A GOD, AND TO STOP FUCKING LIEING

Heres the link
http://lumbridge. org/index.php?topic=180.0

Im getting a picture so if he edits that topic then we will know
